text:
Software Developer | Full-time | Onsite Company: MedBridge We are a start-up (100 employees) that improves clinical outcomes through high quality online education for clinicians and their patients.

Summary of Requirements: - Fullstack or backend software engineer experience for 3 - 5 years - Experience developing, deploying, and running an application in production - Ability to own projects end-to-end

Bonus: - Working in the healthcare space - Golang/PHP/Docker/K8s/Node - Knowledge of AWS - EC2, Cloudsearch, RDS, SQS, SNS, S3, CloudFront

Perks: - Growth potential at a thriving start-up - Continuing education stipend - Dog Fridays

Please apply at: http://medbridge.applytojob.com/apply/AjddrS0vb5/Software-En...

Or send your CV to me!
